description: convert enzyme wrapper to a format compatible with Jest snapshot
name: enzyme-to-json

scripts.build: babel src -d build && babel src/serializer.js -o serializer.js
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn test-core && yarn test-serializer
scripts.test-serializer: cd tests/serializer && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && yarn test
